entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers late in the afternoon. High 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers in the evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Friday 17 March 2023
